targets.query: SELECT last("temperature") FROM "snmp_system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("voltage") / 10 FROM "snmp_system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") / 100 FROM "snmp_system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCInOctets"), 1s) * 8 / $wan_capacity) * 100 FROM "snmp_interface" WHERE ("ifName" = '$wan_interface') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCInOctets"), 1s) * 8 FROM "snmp_interface" WHERE ("ifName" = '$wan_interface') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCOutOctets"), 1s) * 8 FROM "snmp_interface" WHERE ("ifName" = '$wan_interface') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("ifOperStatus") FROM "snmp_interface" WHERE ("ifName" = '$wan_interface') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /ZOOM-DOWN|ZOOM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /ZOOM-UP/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: SECTION D & E — ORGANIZATIONAL & TOP USERS

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /MEDIA/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /SEKRETARIAT/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /INFRA/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /APLIKASI/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /PERSANDIAN/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /KADIS/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE "name" =~ /GUEST/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT top("current_bw", 5) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("inner_bytes"), 1s) * 8 as "current_bw" FROM "mikrotik_queue_tree" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name")
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCInOctets"), 1s) * 8 FROM "snmp_interface" WHERE "ifName" != 'ether1' AND "ifAlias" != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifAlias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCOutOctets"), 1s) * 8 FROM "snmp_interface" WHERE "ifName" != 'ether1' AND "ifAlias" != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifAlias" fill(null)

list.label: WAN Interface
list.name: wan_interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_interface" WITH KEY = "ifName"
